email_sequence.subject: Ultraleather vs digital-native competitors
email_sequence.body:
Hi Sergio,

I see Ultraleather still relies on PDF catalogs. Companies with manual distribution typically experience:

- Price updates taking 3-5 days to reach reps
- Conflicting quotes from outdated sheets
- Reps working from wrong info constantly

Is this creating headaches for your team?

email_sequence.subject: How Globalux Lighting eliminated your exact problem
email_sequence.body:
Hey Sergio,

Globalux Lighting had Ultraleather's exact problem:

"Mobile failures devastate trade show performance"

Their transformation:
• Order time: 4 hours → 15 minutes
• Error rate: 30% → <1%
• Real-time mobile ordering at trade shows
• 47-day payback period

Proven across $2.3M customer portfolio.

Want their implementation playbook?

Best,
[Your Name]
